task_prefix: E-commerce product classification dataset from Otto Group, one of the world's largest e-commerce companies. Contains anonymized features derived from product descriptions and attributes for classifying products into 9 categories. Each example contains 5 features. Predict the target class.

column_descriptions.feat_1: Anonymized product feature 1. Derived from product attributes, descriptions, or behavior but obfuscated for proprietary reasons.
column_descriptions.feat_2: Anonymized product feature 2. Count or encoded categorical variable related to product characteristics.
Features 3-92 follow similar pattern. Each represents different aspect of product data after feature engineering.
column_descriptions.feat_93: Anonymized product feature 93. Final engineered feature in the set.
column_descriptions.target: Product category class from Class_1 to Class_9. Represents major product groupings in Otto's catalog.

class_description: Classes: 'Class_1' (Product category 1 (specific category anonymized - likely fashion, electronics, home goods, etc.)), 'Class_2' (Product category 2), 'Class_3' (Product category 3), 'Class_4' (Product category 4), 'Class_5' (Product category 5), 'Class_6' (Product category 6), 'Class_7' (Product category 7), 'Class_8' (Product category 8), 'Class_9' (Product category 9)
